about_the_game:
Mystic Mischief is a quirky fun adventure entailing dragons, rats, magic, and all kinds of tomfoolery. Fly through this magical world and steal to your hearts content. Rank up to become the best thief in the land. You will collect hats that will give you special abilities to acquire treasure and ward of the dragons. Experience the carnival, an abandoned castle, and a cave. Discover the tales of how the dragons came to live in their homes. Follow the heart-warming story of how a bird and human can band together to become the best thieves. Will the wizard finally grow up and become the man he should have been? Or will he continue his loser ways and achieve nothing?

Play as a bird that flies around dangerous creatures, stealing high value items while fulfilling your kleptomaniac desires. Collect or use items to defend yourself from enemies. You can also poop on enemies to keep enemies away!
detailed_description:
Mystic Mischief is a quirky fun adventure entailing dragons, rats, magic, and all kinds of tomfoolery. Fly through this magical world and steal to your hearts content. Rank up to become the best thief in the land. You will collect hats that will give you special abilities to acquire treasure and ward of the dragons. Experience the carnival, an abandoned castle, and a cave. Discover the tales of how the dragons came to live in their homes. Follow the heart-warming story of how a bird and human can band together to become the best thieves. Will the wizard finally grow up and become the man he should have been? Or will he continue his loser ways and achieve nothing?

Play as a bird that flies around dangerous creatures, stealing high value items while fulfilling your kleptomaniac desires. Collect or use items to defend yourself from enemies. You can also poop on enemies to keep enemies away!

name: Mystic Mischief
short_description: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.
